reviewText: We absolutely LOVE this movie! Watched as a kid now my daughter watches it!
My nephew introduced this show to me on VHS. Very nice Easter program. EASTER EGG MORNING needs to be released on DVD PLEASE. It's a fun Easter program.

This is a cute little movie with a lot of meaning to it. The little ones were still wanting to watch it up until I had to try to get them interested in Christmas movies. I couldn't find it on a DVD though so I bought this after the older one we had was worn out.
Easter egg morning is a wonderful movie for kids. I just ordered this movie after looking for it for hours because it brings me back to my childhood! Cant wait to watch it.
VHS does not play properly the tracking is off. Video will not come into focus.

For family and children on Easter morning. The voice and songs of pop music superstar Bobby Goldsboro highlight this sparkling animated tale of the Easter bunny's most exciting adventure ever.

Animated (Marketplace 364/1)
